actions.name: ANALYZE_PERFORMANCE
actions.description: Analyze trading performance and show metrics

actions.name: BROWSER_CLICK
actions.description: Click on an element on the webpage

actions.name: BROWSER_EXTRACT
actions.description: Extract data from the webpage

actions.name: BROWSER_NAVIGATE
actions.description: Navigate the browser to a specified URL

actions.name: BROWSER_SCREENSHOT
actions.description: Take a screenshot of the current page

actions.name: BROWSER_SELECT
actions.description: Select an option from a dropdown on the webpage

actions.name: BROWSER_TYPE
actions.description: Type text into an input field on the webpage

actions.name: CALL_MCP_TOOL
actions.description: Calls a tool from an MCP server to perform a specific task

actions.name: CANCEL_FORM
actions.description: Cancels an active form

exampleCalls.user: Use CANCEL_FORM with the provided parameters.

actions.name: CANCEL_GOAL
actions.description: Cancels and deletes a goal item from the user's task list immediately.

actions.name: CANCEL_TASK
actions.description: Cancel a task.

actions.name: CANCEL_TODO
actions.description: Cancels and deletes a todo item from the user's task list immediately.

actions.name: cancelPluginCreation
actions.description: Cancel the current plugin creation job

actions.name: CHANGE_DIRECTORY
actions.description: Change the working directory (restricted to allowed directory).

actions.name: CHAT_WITH_ATTACHMENTS
actions.description: Answer a user request informed by specific attachments based on their IDs. If a user asks to chat with a PDF, or wants more specific information about a link or video or anything else they've attached, this is the action to use.

actions.name: CHECK_PORTFOLIO
actions.description: Check current portfolio status including holdings, positions, and trading performance

actions.name: checkPluginCreationStatus
actions.description: Check the status of a plugin creation job

actions.name: CLEAR_LINEAR_ACTIVITY
actions.description: Clear the Linear activity log

actions.name: CLEAR_SHELL_HISTORY
actions.description: Clears the recorded history of shell commands for the current conversation

actions.name: COMPARE_STRATEGIES
actions.description: Compare available trading strategies

actions.name: COMPLETE_GOAL
actions.description: Marks a goal as completed/achieved.

actions.name: COMPLETE_TODO
actions.description: Marks a todo item as completed.

actions.name: COMPUTERUSE_CLICK
actions.description: Clicks a UI element on the computer using a ComputerUse selector.

actions.name: COMPUTERUSE_GET_APPLICATIONS
actions.description: Lists currently running applications on the target machine.

actions.name: COMPUTERUSE_GET_WINDOW_TREE
actions.description: Gets the UI tree for a running application (useful for understanding what is currently on screen).

actions.name: COMPUTERUSE_OPEN_APPLICATION
actions.description: Opens an application on the target machine (local or MCP).

actions.name: COMPUTERUSE_TYPE
actions.description: Types text into a UI element on the computer using a ComputerUse selector (optionally clearing the field).

actions.name: CONFIGURE_STRATEGY
actions.description: Configure trading strategy parameters

actions.name: CONFIRM_GOAL
actions.description: Confirms or cancels a pending goal creation after user review.

exampleCalls.user: Use CONFIRM_GOAL with the provided parameters.

actions.name: CONFIRM_TODO
actions.description: Confirms or cancels a pending todo creation after user review.

exampleCalls.user: Use CONFIRM_TODO with the provided parameters.

actions.name: CREATE_FORM
actions.description: Creates a new form from a template or custom definition

actions.name: CREATE_GITHUB_BRANCH
actions.description: Creates a new branch in a GitHub repository from an existing branch or commit.

exampleCalls.user: Use CREATE_GITHUB_BRANCH with the provided parameters.

actions.name: CREATE_GITHUB_COMMENT
actions.description: Creates a comment on a GitHub issue or pull request.

parameters.name: body
examples: Implements dark mode and updates docs.

exampleCalls.user: Use CREATE_GITHUB_COMMENT with the provided parameters.

CREATE_GITHUB_COMMENT.body: Implements dark mode and updates docs.

actions.name: CREATE_GITHUB_ISSUE
actions.description: Creates a new issue in a GitHub repository. Use this to report bugs, request features, or track tasks.

parameters.name: body
examples: Implements dark mode and updates docs.

exampleCalls.user: Use CREATE_GITHUB_ISSUE with the provided parameters.

CREATE_GITHUB_ISSUE.body: Implements dark mode and updates docs.
CREATE_GITHUB_ISSUE.title: Add dark mode support

actions.name: CREATE_GITHUB_PULL_REQUEST
actions.description: Creates a new pull request in a GitHub repository to merge changes from one branch to another.

parameters.name: body
examples: Implements dark mode and updates docs.

actions.name: CREATE_GOAL
actions.description: Creates a new long-term achievable goal for the agent or a user.

actions.name: CREATE_LINEAR_COMMENT
actions.description: Add a comment to a Linear issue

exampleCalls.user: Use CREATE_LINEAR_COMMENT with the provided parameters.

actions.name: CREATE_LINEAR_ISSUE
actions.description: Create a new issue in Linear

actions.name: CREATE_POLL
actions.description: Create a poll in Discord with emoji reactions for voting.

actions.name: CREATE_TASK
actions.description: Create an orchestrated background task to be executed by a selected agent provider.

actions.name: CREATE_TODO
actions.description: Creates a new todo item from a user description (daily, one-off, or aspirational) immediately.

actions.name: createPlugin
actions.description: Create a new plugin from a specification using AI assistance

actions.name: createPluginFromDescription
actions.description: Create a plugin from a natural language description

actions.name: DELETE_LINEAR_ISSUE
actions.description: Delete (archive) an issue in Linear

actions.name: DOWNLOAD_MEDIA
actions.description: Downloads a video or audio file from a URL and attaches it to the response message.

actions.name: EDIT_FILE
actions.description: Replace a substring in a file (single replacement).

actions.name: EVM_TRANSFER_TOKENS
actions.description: Transfer tokens between addresses on the same chain

actions.name: EXECUTE_COMMAND
actions.description: Execute shell commands including brew install, npm install, apt-get, system commands, file operations, directory navigation, and scripts.

actions.name: EXECUTE_LIVE_TRADE
actions.description: Execute a live token swap on Solana using Jupiter DEX. Supports ANY Solana token.

actions.name: EXECUTE_ROBLOX_ACTION
actions.description: Execute a custom action in a Roblox game, such as spawning entities, giving rewards, or triggering events.

exampleCalls.user: Use EXECUTE_ROBLOX_ACTION with the provided parameters.

actions.name: EXECUTE_SHELL
actions.description: Execute a shell command in the current working directory (restricted).

actions.name: generate-response
actions.description: Generate an ELIZA response for user input using classic pattern matching.

actions.name: GET_LINEAR_ACTIVITY
actions.description: Get recent Linear activity log with optional filters

actions.name: GET_LINEAR_ISSUE
actions.description: Get details of a specific Linear issue

exampleCalls.user: Use GET_LINEAR_ISSUE with the provided parameters.

actions.name: GET_MARKET_ANALYSIS
actions.description: Get market analysis and trending token information

actions.name: GET_NEWSFEED
actions.description: Download and parse an RSS/Atom feed from a URL

actions.name: GET_ROBLOX_PLAYER
actions.description: Look up information about a Roblox player by their user ID or username.

exampleCalls.user: Use GET_ROBLOX_PLAYER with the provided parameters.

actions.name: GET_USER_INFO
actions.description: Get detailed information about a Discord user including their roles, join date, and permissions.

actions.name: GIT
actions.description: Run a git command (restricted).

actions.name: JOIN_CHANNEL
actions.description: Join a Discord channel - either text (to monitor messages) or voice (to participate in voice chat). You have full voice capabilities!

actions.name: LEAVE_CHANNEL
actions.description: Leave a Discord channel - either text (stop monitoring messages) or voice (disconnect from voice chat). Use this when asked to leave, exit, or disconnect from any Discord channel.

actions.name: LIST_CHANNELS
actions.description: Lists all Discord channels the bot is currently listening to and responding in.

actions.name: LIST_FILES
actions.description: List files in a directory.

actions.name: LIST_LINEAR_PROJECTS
actions.description: List projects in Linear with optional filters

parameters.name: toLowerCase
parameters.description: The to lower case to use.

exampleCalls.user: Use LIST_LINEAR_PROJECTS with the provided parameters.

actions.name: LIST_LINEAR_TEAMS
actions.description: List teams in Linear with optional filters

actions.name: LIST_RSS_FEEDS
actions.description: List all subscribed RSS/Atom feeds

actions.name: LIST_TASKS
actions.description: List tasks managed by the orchestrator.

actions.name: lp_management
actions.description: Manages Liquidity Pool (LP) operations including: onboarding for LP management, depositing tokens into pools, withdrawing from pools, showing LP positions, concentrated liquidity positions with custom price ranges, checking APR/yield, setting auto-rebalance preferences, and finding best pools. Use this action when users mention: liquidity, LP, pools, APR, yield, deposit, withdraw, concentrated, price range, narrow range, degenai, ai16z, SOL pairs, or want help getting started with LP management.

exampleCalls.user: Use lp_management with the provided parameters.

actions.name: manage_raydium_positions
actions.description: Automatically manage Raydium positions by rebalancing them when they drift too far from the pool price

actions.name: MC_ATTACK
actions.description: Attack an entity by numeric entityId (from MC_WORLD_STATE.nearbyEntities).

actions.name: MC_CHAT
actions.description: Send a chat message in Minecraft as the bot

actions.name: MC_CONNECT
actions.description: Connect the Mineflayer bot to a Minecraft server

actions.name: MC_CONTROL
actions.description: Set a control state (e.g. forward/back/left/right/jump/sprint/sneak). Provide JSON {control,state,durationMs?} or 'forward true 1000'.

actions.name: MC_DIG
actions.description: Dig/break the block at (x y z). Provide coordinates like '10 64 -20' or JSON {"x":10,"y":64,"z":-20}.

actions.name: MC_DISCONNECT
actions.description: Disconnect the Mineflayer bot from the Minecraft server

actions.name: MC_GOTO
actions.description: Pathfind to a target (x y z). Provide coordinates like '10 64 -20' or JSON {"x":10,"y":64,"z":-20}.

actions.name: MC_LOOK
actions.description: Look to yaw/pitch (radians). Provide 'yaw pitch' or JSON {yaw,pitch}.

actions.name: MC_PLACE
actions.description: Place the currently-held block onto a reference block face. Provide 'x y z face' (face=up/down/north/south/east/west) or JSON {x,y,z,face}.

actions.name: MC_SCAN
actions.description: Scan nearby blocks. Optional JSON input: {"blocks":["oak_log"],"radius":16,"maxResults":32}. If omitted, scans for any non-air blocks.

actions.name: MC_STOP
actions.description: Stop pathfinding / movement goals.

actions.name: MC_WAYPOINT_DELETE
actions.description: Delete a named waypoint (message text is the name).

actions.name: MC_WAYPOINT_GOTO
actions.description: Pathfind to a named waypoint (message text is the name).

actions.name: MC_WAYPOINT_LIST
actions.description: List saved waypoints.

actions.name: MC_WAYPOINT_SET
actions.description: Save the bot's current position as a named waypoint (message text is the name).

actions.name: MERGE_GITHUB_PULL_REQUEST
actions.description: Merges a GitHub pull request using merge, squash, or rebase strategy.

exampleCalls.user: Use MERGE_GITHUB_PULL_REQUEST with the provided parameters.

actions.name: PAUSE_TASK
actions.description: Pause a running task.

actions.name: PIN_MESSAGE
actions.description: Pin an important message in a Discord channel.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_CHECK_ORDER_SCORING
actions.description: Checks if any of the authenticated user orders are eligible for rewards (scoring).

actions.name: POLYMARKET_CREATE_API_KEY
actions.description: Create API key credentials for Polymarket CLOB authentication

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_ACCOUNT_ACCESS_STATUS
actions.description: Retrieves account access status from Polymarket, including U.S. certification requirements and API key details.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_ACTIVE_ORDERS
actions.description: Fetches open/active orders for the authenticated user from Polymarket, optionally filtered by market or asset.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_ALL_API_KEYS
actions.description: Retrieves all API keys associated with the authenticated user Polymarket account.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_BEST_PRICE
actions.description: Gets the current best price (top of book) for a specified token ID and side (BUY/SELL) on Polymarket.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_CLOB_MARKETS
actions.description: Retrieves a paginated list of markets directly from the Polymarket CLOB API, including pagination support.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_MARKET_DETAILS
actions.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific Polymarket market by its condition ID.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_MARKETS
actions.description: Retrieve available prediction markets from Polymarket with optional filters

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_MIDPOINT
actions.description: Get the midpoint price between best bid and ask

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_MIDPOINT_PRICE
actions.description: Gets the midpoint price (average of best bid and best ask) for a specified token ID on Polymarket.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_OPEN_MARKETS
actions.description: Retrieves a list of currently open (active and not closed) markets from Polymarket.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_ORDER_BOOK
actions.description: Retrieve order book summary for a specific token

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_ORDER_BOOK_DEPTH
actions.description: Retrieves the full order book depth (all bids and asks) for a specific token ID on Polymarket.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_ORDER_BOOK_SUMMARY
actions.description: Retrieves a summary of the order book for a specific token ID on Polymarket, including best bid/ask and spread.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_ORDER_DETAILS
actions.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific order by its ID on Polymarket.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_PRICE_HISTORY
actions.description: Retrieves historical prices for a specific token ID on Polymarket over a specified time range.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_SAMPLING_MARKETS
actions.description: Retrieve markets with rewards/incentives enabled for sampling

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_SIMPLIFIED_MARKETS
actions.description: Retrieve simplified market data with minimal fields for quick overview

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_SPREAD
actions.description: Gets the bid-ask spread for a specified token ID on Polymarket.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_GET_TRADE_HISTORY
actions.description: Retrieves the authenticated user trade history from Polymarket, optionally filtered by market or asset.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_HANDLE_AUTHENTICATION
actions.description: Checks and displays the current authentication status for Polymarket CLOB operations.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_HANDLE_REALTIME_UPDATES
actions.description: Manages WebSocket subscriptions for real-time Polymarket data updates including order books and trades.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_PLACE_ORDER
actions.description: Create and place limit or market orders on Polymarket

actions.name: POLYMARKET_RETRIEVE_ALL_MARKETS
actions.description: Retrieves all available markets from Polymarket by paginating through the entire catalog.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_REVOKE_API_KEY
actions.description: Revokes an existing API key from your Polymarket account.

actions.name: POLYMARKET_SETUP_WEBSOCKET
actions.description: Sets up and configures WebSocket connections for real-time Polymarket data streaming.

actions.name: POST
actions.description: Post content on X (formerly Twitter)

actions.name: POST_INSTAGRAM_COMMENT
actions.description: Post a comment on an Instagram post

exampleCalls.user: Use POST_INSTAGRAM_COMMENT with the provided parameters.

actions.name: PROCESS_KNOWLEDGE

actions.name: PUSH_GITHUB_CODE

exampleCalls.user: Use PUSH_GITHUB_CODE with the provided parameters.

actions.name: REACT_TO_MESSAGE
actions.description: Add an emoji reaction to a Discord message.

actions.name: READ_CHANNEL
actions.description: Reads recent messages from a Discord channel and either returns them or provides a summary. Can focus on messages from a specific user.

actions.name: READ_FILE
actions.description: Read and return a file's contents.

actions.name: READ_MCP_RESOURCE
actions.description: Reads a resource from an MCP server

actions.name: RECORD_EXPERIENCE

exampleCalls.user: Use RECORD_EXPERIENCE with the provided parameters.

actions.description: Generate a remote attestation to prove that the agent is running in a TEE (Trusted Execution Environment)

actions.description: Search for text across files under a directory.

actions.name: SEARCH_MESSAGES

actions.description: Posts a cast (message) on Farcaster

exampleCalls.user: Use SEND_CAST with the provided parameters.

actions.name: SERVER_INFO
actions.description: Get information about the current Discord server including member count, creation date, and other statistics.

actions.name: START_TRADING
actions.description: Start automated trading with a specified strategy. Supports ANY Solana token.

actions.name: STOP_TRADING
actions.description: Stop automated trading

actions.name: SUBSCRIBE_RSS_FEED
actions.description: Subscribe to an RSS/Atom feed for automatic monitoring

actions.name: SUMMARIZE_CONVERSATION
actions.description: Summarizes the conversation and attachments.

actions.name: SWAP_SOLANA
actions.description: Perform a token swap from one token to another on Solana. Works with SOL and SPL tokens.

actions.name: SWITCH_TASK
actions.description: Switch the current task context to a different task.

actions.name: TRANSCRIBE_MEDIA
actions.description: Transcribe the full text of an audio or video file that the user has attached.

actions.name: UNPIN_MESSAGE
actions.description: Unpin a message in a Discord channel.

actions.name: UNSUBSCRIBE_RSS_FEED
actions.description: Unsubscribe from an RSS/Atom feed

actions.name: UPDATE_FORM

actions.name: UPDATE_GOAL
actions.description: Updates an existing goal's name or description.

actions.name: UPDATE_TODO

actions.name: WRITE_FILE
